[`IOLockAlloc`](/documentation/kernel/1553021-iolockalloc)Allocates and initializes a mutex.[`IOLockInitWithState`](/documentation/kernel/1553028-iolockinitwithstate)[`IOLockFree`](/documentation/kernel/1553034-iolockfree)Frees a mutex.[`IOTryLock`](/documentation/kernel/1553012-iotrylock)[`IOTakeLock`](/documentation/kernel/1553007-iotakelock)[`IOLockLock`](/documentation/kernel/1553000-iolocklock)Lock a mutex.[`IOUnlock`](/documentation/kernel/1552994-iounlock)[`IOLockTryLock`](/documentation/kernel/1553018-iolocktrylock)Attempt to lock a mutex.[`IOLockUnlock`](/documentation/kernel/1553006-iolockunlock)Unlock a mutex.[`IOLockWakeup`](/documentation/kernel/1553016-iolockwakeup)[`IOLockSleep`](/documentation/kernel/1553026-iolocksleep)Sleep with mutex unlock and relock[`IOLockSleepDeadline`](/documentation/kernel/1553030-iolocksleepdeadline)[`IOLockGetMachLock`](/documentation/kernel/1553008-iolockgetmachlock)Accessor to a Mach mutex.### [Read/Write Locks](/documentation/kernel/iokit_fundamentals/locks#3572182)
